item.title: Generate data using TPC-DS Connector in Athena's Federated Query
item.description: Athena’s Federated Query is a feature to execute queries on non-S3 data sources such as DynamoDB and RDS through Lambda function which is a data sources connector. This article uses TPC-DS Connector in the AWS official repository. It generates the data of TPC-DS, which is a database benchmark in Decision Support. Although it is in the official repository, it is a custom connector, so you need to build it yourself.
